name: Tomato
description: consumed in diverse ways: raw or cooked, and in many dishes, sauces, salads, and drinks

name: Potato
description: The potato is a starchy food, The tubers are highly digestible and supply vitamin C, protein, thiamin, and niacin

name: Lady's Finger
description: considered a good source of carbohydrates,proteins,vitamins,enzymes,calcium,potassium and many other nutrients

name: chilli
description: Chili peppers are members of the nightshade (Solanaceae) family and are related to tomatoes, cherries and eggplant

name: garlic
description: It was known to ancient Egyptians and has been used as both a food flavoring and a traditional medicine

name: Cabbage
description: Cabbage, comprising several cultivars of Brassica oleracea, is a leafy green, red (purple), or white (pale green)

name: Brinjal
description: Brinjal (Solanum melongena), also known as eggplant or aubergine, is an easily cultivated plant

name: Beetroot
description: contain a good amount of manganese, which is involved in bone formation, nutrient metabolism, brain function

name: Pumpkin
description: traditional Halloween decoration .The flesh provides a range of health benefits outside of popular festivities.
